title: Below average
text:
Staying for 10 days due to Covid travel restrictions.
Accommodation very low standard. Old, should be renewed in many aspects. No hangers in room cabinets. Room cleanliness 3/10, window curtains in yellow, room cannot get dark. Doors now properly tight, can hear people from other rooms and corridors. Room service called me in the morning around 8am , although they were advised not to call me in rest hours.
Restaurant food low quality 3/10.
Generally, try to avoid this accommodation.

title: Excellent food, location, service
text:
Ordered Rib-eye steak, grilled asparagus, french fries.... all more than excellent, food, service....
Even i got Brandy at the end on house....
Strongly recommended for anyone

title: Good place to book if in Athens
text:
Hotel is located almost in centre of Athens, even you can walk to Sintagma square, or you take a taxi, will cost 4-5 eur.
Hotel staff friendly, rooms are comfortable, clean, sound proof. Only thing what was little dissapointing in this kind of hotel is that I booked Exectutive room, but the room was average in matter od sq meters, probably like basic/standard room. Maybe the hotel staff should make better photos of each kind of room, so the guest would see excatly how the room look like.
Breakfast was good, lot of food, all sorts.

title: Tasty pizza you must try
text: Really tasty, all kinds of pizza, you can eat there or order on delivery. We took capriciosa (attached photo), it was full of everything. Even you can ask to make pizza as per your own recipe. Hospitality of personnel is on high level. Recommend to everybody.

title: Must see
text: Something you must see. History in its early begginings. Heritage that must be saved for future generations.

title: Good tasty sushi food
text:
Nice location, good serving, tasty and not so expensive food. Recommend if you are nearby.
We came there after 9pm and it was not so crowded so you can get table easily.

title: Something you have to experience
text: I visited Modena and Maranello , both Enzo Ferrari and Maranello musem. This is something everybody must see. During visit at Maranello i stop by Pushstart and rent Ferrari 488GTB. Awesome! Once in a lifetime everybody must drive such cars like the one you can rent there,

title: Excellent hotel to book if you are in Carpi
text:
Very clean room, no remarks as well as toilet/bathroom which is equipped with all new staff. Wi-fi and TV working fast with no remarks. Parking is private, and it is well protected and supervised. There is a bar in the hotel as well as morning breakfast.
This hotel is in the high level standards in all aspects, and can compare to any 5-star hotel, it is even better.

title: Great restaurant
text:
I tried beef fillet, with baked potatoes, and for desert - Mascarpone cake....
All were great. Service - excellent. Definetely will come back sometime....

title: Great work
text:
If you are really looking for the best massage in the area, Emily would be the best choice.
I enjoyed really and it helped me a lot.
